item.description:
Come enjoy great bloodies, mimosas,wood burning stove, AND of course LIVE BLUES and dancing! Join us from 1-4pm to listen to blues before we head down the street to the charming Tratoria Simpatico for half priced appetizers in the outside bar, and a relaxing end to a great day with new friends and old! read more Talk about this Meetup - Post a comment

WE WILL BE JOINNG THE NARRAGANSETT GROUP FOR THIS

BAND IS ROGER CERICI AND THE ALL STARZ.. SO IT IS SWING MORE THAN BLUES

HOURS ARE 1PM TO 4PM

AFTERWARDS OFF TO EAT AT THE BEAUTIFUL TRATORIA SIMPATICO

HOPE FOR A BEAUTIFUL DAY

HOPE YOU CAN ALL COME BECAUSE THIS WILL BE A BLAST.

MEET THE NARRAGANSETT SINGLE GROUP AND MEET NEW PEOPLE.

CLIARE

NEED TO UPDATE THIS MEETUP SO I DO NOT DISAPPOINT MEMBERS

ROGER CERICI IS PLAYING BUT NOT WITH THE ALL STARZ , PLEASE GO TO NARRAGANSET CAFE WEBSITE TO CHECK IT OUT. HOWEVER HE WILL JOINING THE OTHER GROUP WHICH IS NOTED TO BE QUITE GOOD.  SO IT MAY BE MORE BLUES THAN SWING, HOPE THIS DOES NOT DISAPPOINT.

SEEMS MY EFFORTS HAVE HAD SOME DISAPPOINTED MEMBERS SO I WILL REITERATE. I FOUND MY INFORMATION ON THE ROGER CERICI WEB SITE WHICH STATES HE IS PLAYING AT THE NARRAGANSETT CAFE ON SUNDAY.

PLEASE RECHECK IF YOU HAVE INFORMATION WHICH YOU MIGHT FEEL IS NOT WHAT YOU ARE INTERESTED IN.

I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE WHEN YOU MIGHT NOT BE UNHAPPY WITH INFORMATION GIVEN THAT I DID MY OWN RESEARCH ON.

I DO NOT CLAIM TO BE ALWAYS CORRECT.

I DO MY BEST, BUT THIS IMFORMATION IS NOT ALWAYS CORRECT.

SORRY IF THIS MIGHT HAVE INCONVENIENCED YOU IN ANY WAY.

CLAIRE

1:00-4:00

Most of you know how talented and diversified Robin Soares and Jon Hathaway (5 Flavor Discount fame) are-BUT-when they join us to put on a ‘Blues’ show it is an extra special treat..Another Ganny talent Roger Ceresi will be joining them  with his dynamic voice and percussion set- along with Rich Ribb also singing and playing bass guitar.

I know you will be incredibly happy you sauntered into the Cafe for a great afternoon of Blues, Bloodies, mimosas and fabuloso food!

See you Sunday!

 

**Sneak Preview for next Week**

THIS IS UPDATED SO EVERYONE KNOWS WHO IS PLAYING

ROGER CERESI IS JOINING ROBIN SOARS AND JON HATHAWAY AS WELL AS RICH RIBB

IT SEEMS IT IS A COLABORATIVE EFFORT

I THINK IT WILL BE GREAT

HOWEVER IF YOU ARE DISSATISFIED

IT IS A CHOICE YOU MAKE TO GO OR NOT GO!

BUT DO WISH ANYONE NOT GOING WOULD BE KIND ENOUGH TO LET ME KNOW AS I HAVE MADE RESERVATIONS AT THE RESTAURANT FOR ALL OF US.

BE CONSIDERATE IF YOU PLAN ON NOT COMEING?

ALL MEMBERS WHO DO NOT SHOW FOR THIS WILL BE EXCLUDED FROM THIS SITE FOR NOT ALLOWING ME TO KNOW IN ADVANCE OF YOUR REAL INTENTIONS.

SORRY BUT ALLOT OF WORK GOES INTO PLANNING THESE EVENTS AND

NEED TO HAVE COOPERATION FROM ALL MEMBERS SO

THINGS CAN GO SMOOTH.
item.how_to_find_us: I WILL BE THERE WITH MEETUP SIGN.
item.why: JOINING THE NARRAGANSETT GROUP FOR A DAY OF DANCING, AND APPITIZERS AT TRATORIA SIMPATICO IN JAMESTOWN. MEETING NEW PEOPLE AND REALXING WITH NEW FRIENDS.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: SWING DANCING AND APPITIZERS AT TRATORIA SIMPATICO
